card_text: Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Target 1 "Cyberdark" Effect Monster you control; equip 1 Dragon or Machine monster from either GY to it as an Equip Spell that gives it 1000 ATK.$N●Send 1 Equip Card you control equipped to a Machine monster to the GY; destroy 1 card your opponent controls.$NYou can only use each effect of "Cyberdark Invasion" once per turn.
